DONT FORGET ROUNDING

```{r}
##8.1
#A
pnorm(1.43, lower.tail = FALSE)
#B
pnorm(-1.43, lower.tail = FALSE) 
#C
1-(pnorm(2.17, lower.tail = FALSE)+pnorm(0.19))
#This is correct, back of book is wrong!
#D
pnorm(1.14) - pnorm(-2.21)
```

```{r}
zscore <- function(xbar, mu, sd.x, n = 1){
  z <- (xbar - mu)/(sd.x/sqrt(n))
  return(z)
}
```

```{r}
#8.2 A
zfish <- zscore(xbar = 40, 
                mu = 34.29, 
                sd.x = 5.49)
pnorm(zfish, lower.tail = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#8.2B
zfish2 <- zscore(40, 34.29, 5.49, n = 10)
pnorm(zfish2, lower.tail = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#8.2 C
zfishH <- zscore(42, 34.29, 5.49) 
zfishL <- zscore(32, 34.29, 5.49)
(pnorm(zfishH) - pnorm(zfishL))
#This is correct, back of book is wrong!
```
